external_games.name: Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend

name: Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend
summary: Play the overwhelming 'Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend' and unleash your divine and dark powers! You are the mighty Demigod, who possesses both the power of angels and demons. You, who had all your powers taken away by the Archangel Michael and the Archdemon Lucifer while trying to conquer the heavens... Now, regain your angelic and demonic powers and embark on your revenge..!
